text:
URGENT - has anybody seen this link type for an image in HubSpot before - <https://f.HubSpotusercontent40.net/hubfs/7082247/assets/img/baby-icon.svg>??
Usually when you copy an image link you get a dropdown and can select a cloudflare CDN link but I don’t get that in GWK. I did but now I don’t. I can’t get the images to show when using this link type.
Cloudflare connected apps is completely gone

Thank you HubSpot development team! :clapping: - I recently had a client ask me if one of my modules had the ability to have 15 minute time slots instead of 30 minutes. I told him I would look into to see if it was possible and lo and behold you provided an interval field. Thank you for all the great features and work you are doing on the CMS. It makes my job fun.
Anyone already tried creating simple payment getway using STRIPE like on this one? <https://stripe.com/docs/payments/accept-a-payment#web-collect-card-details>
Hey Abaam, yep, we created that at DepositFIx: <http://depositfix.com|depositfix.com>
